adrFormatAddress: 155 E 91st St #1d, New York, NY 10128, USA

originalText.text: Dr Lohitsa is an incredible doctor. He gives nuanced and appropriate medication. However where he really shines is in his abilities as a therapist. He pushes one to be a person who can live without being addled with symptoms of mental illness. He brings intellect and wisdom without pushing his own biases/ opinions. While his accreditations are impressive (if not ideal), his personality is something that cannot be replicated or taught. To me (as he should be to you), Akshay Lohitsa is the best therapist in nyc who, as a side note- is also a great doctor. 10/10 guy; will return.

originalText.text: Dr. Lohitsa is a wonderful physician! He is caring, listens intently, and empathizes with my plight. I would and have strongly recommend his services to my friends and family. Thank you for all of your help Dr. Lohitsa!

text.text: Dr. Lohitsa is a wonderful physician! He is caring, listens intently, and empathizes with my plight. I would and have strongly recommend his services to my friends and family. Thank you for all of your help Dr. Lohitsa!

originalText.text: Dr. Lohitsa is not only knowledgable, but is compassionate and cares about helping others. He is both warm and professional. Highly recommend working with him!

text.text: Dr. Lohitsa is not only knowledgable, but is compassionate and cares about helping others. He is both warm and professional. Highly recommend working with him!

originalText.text: I’m giving him a 2 star review for several reasons. So lately I’ve been dealing with anxiety and I figured that it was time to meet someone that could really help me out. I looked in Zocdoc and searched for several psychiatrists in NYC and decided to go with him for his 5 star reviews. Even though it’s extremely expensive ($400 a session) I figured it was necessary so I gave it a shot. During the session we had a good conversation and he made some good observations (nothing really out of this world just a couple of points that made me reflect). However the reason why I’m giving him a two star review is because I believe he didn’t really grasp the issues that I was dealing with. His diagnose lacked  insight and he automatically prescribed me Zoloft ( which is a SSRI). This would “help me” in the long run but it has terrible side effects and I’m not really comfortable taking anything like that. When I asked him through text if there was an alternative treatment he refuses to give me any alternatives and pushed for another session. In other words, if you’re looking just to get medicated and forget about the real issue this is the place to go, but if you want some deep and analytical insight don’t waste your time or money.

originalText.text: Dr. Akshay Lohitsa is an amazing physician. He is a wonderful listener who is kind and empathetic. I would recommend him to anyone.
